title: Doug Jones: Trump’s true legal exposure from the January 6th investigation
description: Former Alabama Senator Doug Jones (D) talks to Chuck about Joe Biden and Democrats' prospects in 2024. A former U.S. Attorney, Jones also explains the challenges of pursuing a criminal case against former President Trump and his allies. Jones says the fraud allegations are “the email version of a telemarketing scheme.”
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
